data.title: 2016 Nian zhong yang dian shi tai chun jie lian huan wan hui (TV Special 2016)
data.meta_description: 2016 Nian zhong yang dian shi tai chun jie lian huan wan hui: Directed by Yitao LÃ¼. With Kainan Bai, Guoqing Cai, Ming Cai, Qing Dong. The CCTV New Year's Gala, also known as the Spring Festival Gala (Chunwan in short) is a Chinese New Year special produced by China Central Television (CCTV). The program is a variety show, often featuring music, dance, comedy, and drama performances, recognized by Guinness World Records as the world's most watched television program.
data.text: Maybe in China,this is the biggest show in this country,(because it is made in CCTV. Hihihi),but every years, it exists like a joke. Each program makes the actors and audience feel very embarrassed. The audience in the studio squeezed some smiles from their faces and reluctantly applauded. It can be imagined that if the audience is a real audience, the scene may be really silent. Here we do not deny the strength of each actor. They are really better actors in China, but due to the limitations of the program, They can't present the best side to everyone, which is the major problem of the party director group. I can't see the future of this program in the performance. It is impossible to expect this program to be better and better. Everyone hopes that this program can be like 20 or 30 years ago, which every Chinese must watch when they go home for the New Year. It is not only an ordinary TV program, but also a family's expectation for the New Year. It represents what the Chinese say is reunion. The Chinese can do nothing, but can't come out.
